articles.title: Box Office: ‘Civil War’ Drawing Blood in Battle With New Vampire Pic ‘Abigail’ for No. 1 - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Guy Ritchie's Henry Cavill-starrer 'The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare' is also new to the marquee this weekend alongside 'Abigail,' the latest movie from Radio Silence.
articles.content:
Alex Garland’s dystopian political action film Civil War about an America torn apart appears to be fending off new vampire pic Abigail at the box office.
If estimates hold, Civil War will stay No. 1… [+2147 chars]
